Package com.scg.domain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Account
    Interface all accounts must implement.
    TerminationListener
    Interface for accepting notification of consultant terminations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BenefitManager
    Logs changes in benefits.
    ClientAccount
    Encapsulates the information for a billable client account.
    CompensationManager
    Approves or rejects compensation changes.
    Consultant
    A consultant.
    Consultant.SerializationProxy
    Serialization proxy for the Consultant class.
    ConsultantTime
    A consultants time, maintains date, skill, account and hours data.
    Eeoc
    The EEOC monitors SCG's terminations.
    HumanResourceManager
    Responsible for modifying the pay rate and sick leave and vacation hours of staff consultants.
    Invoice
    Invoice encapsulates the attributes and behavior to create client invoices for a given time period from time cards.
    InvoiceFooter
    Footer for Small Consulting Group Invoices.
    InvoiceHeader
    Header for Small Consulting Group Invoices.
    InvoiceLineItem
    Encapsulates a single billable item to be included in an invoice.
    StaffConsultant
    A consultant who is kept on staff (receives benefits).
    TerminationEvent
    Event used to notify listeners of a Consultant's termination.
    TimeCard
    Encapsulates a time card capable of storing a consultant's billable and non-billable hours for a week.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NonBillableAccount
    Encapsulates the concept of a non-billable account, such as sick leave, vacation, or business development.
    Skill
    Encapsulates the concept of a billable skill.
